results.title: Activia Blueberry Muffins
results.ingredients: 240g Activia Blueberry,100g honey,50ml milk,1 large egg,125g plain flour,75g oats, 1 tsp baking powder, tsp bicarbonate of soda,125g blueberries,1 tsp demerara sugar

results.title: Apple & Pecan Muffins with Salted6
results.ingredients: 135g unsalted butter, softened, 60g for the muffins, 75g for the icing,210g Tate & Lyle Light Muscovado Sugar, 110g for the muffins, 75g for the icing, 25g for the salted caramel pecans ,2 large eggs, at room temperature, beaten ,75g pecans, roughly chopped, plus 24 pecan halves for the salted caramel pecans,1 Cox apple, peeled, cored and roughly grated ,150g self raising flour , sifted,1 tsp ground cinnamon ,55ml maple syrup, plus one and half tbsp for the icing,110g cream cheese, full fat,1 pinch sea salt

results.title: Apricot Tart with Honey and Pistachios
results.ingredients: 25g butter, melted,5 tbsp clear honey ,80g roasted pistachio nuts , shelled weight,1 tsp cinnamon ,375g puff pastry fresh & ready rolled,1 orange,10 apricots, halved and stoned

results.title: Apricot and pistachio flapjack
results.ingredients: 150g butter,150g soft brown sugar,3 tbsp honey,200g oats,100g pistachios,150g dried apricots , chopped,1 orange, zest

results.title: Aromatic Citrus Polenta Cake
results.ingredients: 40g Merchant Gourmet polenta,110g ground almonds,275g Tate & Lyle Golden Caster Sugar,1 tsps baking powder, level,200ml vegetable oil ,4 medium eggs, beaten,1 orange , grated zest for the cake, the juice for the syrup,1 lemon, grated zest for the cake, the juice for the syrup,1 lime, grated zest for the cake, the juice for the syrup,75g Lyle's Golden Syrup, for the syrup,5 star anise, for the syrup,2 cinnamon sticks, for the syrup,8 cardamom pods, lightly crushed under the blade of a knife, for the syrup,200g greek yoghurt, for the garnish,110g pomegranate seeds, for the garnish

results.title: Asparagus and Cheese Brunch Muffins
results.ingredients: 12 asparagus spears ,400g self raising flour ,200g Cheshire cheese , cut into small cubes,125g butter ,1 small bunch of chives, stripped into pieces  ,150ml milk ,100ml plain yogurt ,1 tsp English mustard ,2 eggs

results.title: Baileys Baked Cheesecake
results.ingredients: 110g sweet oat biscuits,25g butter, melted,50ml Baileys Original Irish Cream ,250g marscapone cream cheese,200g fromage frais,200g dark chocolate ,100g for the filling, 75% cocoa or more, plus 100g to serve,2 large eggs,40g caster sugar,1 tbsp cocoa powder, to serve,2 tbsp cream , to serve

results.title: Baklava
results.ingredients: 350g unsalted butter (melted), plus 1 tbsp for greasing,175g blanched almonds,175g raw pistachio nuts,250g sugar, divided,450g filo pastry, thawed if frozen,175g honey,60ml rose water,2 tbsp lemon juice

results.title: Banana Bread With Jujube And Chocolate
results.ingredients: 180g banana, ripe,3 tbsps raw cacao powder,2 tbsps coconut oil,60g coconut sugar,2 eggs,114g ground almonds,70g oat flour,2 cups dried Jujube Fruits, roughly chopped,1 handful Jujube Crisps

results.title: Banana Bread and Butter Pudding
results.ingredients: 1 loaf thick sliced white bread,300g butter, 200g and 100g for the sauce,150g demerara sugar,3 bananas, cut into slices,6 eggs, 3 whole eggs, and 3 egg yolks

results.title: Banana Cupcakes
results.ingredients: 170g butter, 115g for the cupcakes, 55g for the icing,115g caster sugar,2 medium eggs,115g self raising flour,1 ripe banana, mashed,225g icing sugar, sieved,1 tsp vanilla essence

results.title: Banana and Toffee Log
results.ingredients: 125g self-raising flour,125g light brown sugar,3 large eggs,2 bananas,397g Carnation caramel, ( 1 can),150ml whipping cream,25g milk chocolate

results.title: Banana, Coconut & Honey Cake
results.ingredients: 150g unsalted butter, melted and slightly cooled,80g light brown sugar,4 large eggs,50ml runny honey, (Hilltop Raw Thyme Honey gives a delicious flavour)

results.title: Berry Madeleines
results.ingredients: 3 eggs , large ,150g caster sugar , 120g for the madeleines, 30g for the sauce,200g flour ,120g butter ,1 tsp baking powder,1 lemon , large,350g mixed berries , 200g for the sauce, 150 for the madeleines

results.title: Black Garlic Brownies
results.ingredients: 9 oz dark chocolate, 70-85%,1 cup butter,1 cups sugar,2 tsp vanilla essence,3 bulb black garlic,1 cup flour,1 tsp salt,4 eggs
